info.title: DiiLC
info.author: Conanac
info.details:
This is a simple application for downloading and inserting DLC/HDLC to savegame file for Animal Crossing (Wii version).

Usage: Extract the gamesave file using Waninkoko's Savegame Extractor, then run this application. And if there is no setting file (dlcsetting.xml) or it is of a different version, it will be created automatically, otherwise it will be used for setting the directories/files names as well as the associated choices of delivery mechanism.

Controls: 
Push button A for downloading and inserting DLC from four regions; button B for downloading and inserting available HDLC; button Home for exiting without downloading DLC or HDLC.

Credits:
teknecal for HTTP download example, Yellows8 for wc24decrypt, joedj for ftpii, DsPet for dlc/hdlc PC applications, Magicus for Parse-u8, SonicHyuga for nice icon.
